title: Why is the Holy Son So Delicate? - Novel Updates
tags: Androgynous Characters   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Fantasy World   Hiding True Identity   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Manly Gay Couple   Misunderstandings   Popular Love Interests   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: Gu Yan   咕彦
description:
Pei Xia transmigrated into a discontinued western fantasy novel and became the unlucky cannon fodder who had a pure body that was coveted by evil spirits and constantly suffered death threats.

The protagonist of the novel was Lucifer, the holy son from the Church of Light. He possessed a beautiful appearance and divine purification ability.>
